publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2483 Margaret Smith: Wear it Pink—That the Parliament recognises that over 4,000 people in Scotland will be diagnosed with breast cancer in 2008; endorses Breast Cancer Campaign’s organisation of wear it pink on Friday 31 October 2008; notes the importance of the event in promoting awareness of breast cancer among the general public; encourages MSPs to participate in the initiative to help raise funds for innovative world-class breast cancer research at centres of excellence throughout Scotland, and congratulates Breast Cancer Campaign and all of its supporters for having raised over £3.2 million in 2007 through wear it pink.
S3M-2483 Wear it Pink (lodged on 3 September 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2483 Margaret Smith: Wear it Pink—That the Parliament recognises that over 4,000 people in Scotland will be diagnosed with breast cancer in 2008; endorses Breast Cancer Campaign’s organisation of wear it pink on Friday 31 October 2008; notes the importance of the event in promoting awareness of breast cancer among the general public; encourages MSPs to participate in the initiative to help raise funds for innovative world-class breast cancer research at centres of excellence throughout Scotland, and congratulates Breast Cancer Campaign and all of its supporters for having raised over £3.2 million in 2007 through wear it pink. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Elaine Murray*, Jim Hume*, Ken Macintosh*, David Whitton*, John Scott*, Nanette Milne*, Mike Pringle*, Jamie McGrigor*, Johann Lamont*, Karen Gillon*, Jackie Baillie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Cathie Craigie*, Karen Whitefield*, Marlyn Glen*, Cathy Peattie*, Rhoda Grant*, David Stewart*, Bashir Ahmad*, James Kelly*, Mary Scanlon*, Margaret Mitchell*, John Farquhar Munro*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Nigel Don*, Sandra White*, Claire Baker*, Margaret Curran*, Alex Johnstone*, Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Hugh Henry*, Bill Butler*, Cathy Jamieson*, Alison McInnes*, Annabel Goldie*, Tricia Marwick*, Duncan McNeil*, Richard Baker*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-2483 Wear it Pink (lodged on 3 September 2008) Jack McConnell*, John Lamont*
S3M-2483 Wear it Pink (lodged on 3 September 2008) Jackson Carlaw*
S3M-2483 Wear it Pink (lodged on 3 September 2008) Tom McCabe*
